company_overview.description: CommuniKATE is a creative agency delivering strategic brand stories, standout design, and marketing that moves you forward. They help businesses cut through the noise with design that's not just beautiful—but strategic, intentional, and built to create waves.
company_overview.mission: To help businesses read, write and communicate effectively, supporting families on the path to growth.
company_overview.value_proposition: Think of us as your crew—navigating branding, design, web, and marketing so your business sails further, faster.
unique_selling_points: Flexible fit from quick projects to full-scale builds
Proven, repeatable process from first draft to final delivery
Highly organized with files never lost and versions always tracked
Purpose-driven design with clear CTAs and audience targeting
Collaborative and easy to work with

contact_form_fields: What do you need help with? (optional)

founder.name: Kate Reeve
founder.title: Founder, Strategist, Creative Captain
founder.background: Background in branding, design, and marketing strategy
founder.client_experience: Worked with companies across industries—from local nonprofits to national service brands
founder.philosophy: Design isn't just what something looks like—it's how it works, how it moves people, and how it tells the story that matters.

methodology.description: At CommuniKATE, we apply thoughtful frameworks to give every project clarity and momentum.

pillars.name: BE SEEN
pillars.description: Through eye-catching visuals & messaging that resonates

pillars.name: BE UNDERSTOOD
pillars.description: With clear positioning and user-focused storytelling

pillars.name: BE SUCCESSFUL
pillars.description: By aligning every touchpoint with your long-term goals

methodology.approach: Every brand's journey is unique, and your strategy should be too. No cookie-cutter solutions. Every plan is built with intention, grounded in research, and customized for your brand.

branding.title: Branding / Logo Design
branding.description: From subtle refreshes to bold transformations—aligned, consistent, and built to last.
branding.key_question: Do you stand out from the crowd? Your logo is the door to your brand experience.
process: Get to know you and your business
Collaborative refinement of design and color schemes

websites.title: Website Design & Development
websites.description: Strategic, scalable, and fully optimized websites that work as hard as you do.
websites.philosophy: We design simple, compelling, and functional websites that make it easy for users to quickly find exactly what they're looking for.

key_elements.name: Clear Content
key_elements.description: Your brand story matters but can your audience understand your message?

key_elements.name: User Experience
key_elements.description: Can your target audience easily find the information they are looking for?

key_elements.name: Strategic Design
key_elements.description: Does your site reflect your brand guidelines and style?

key_elements.name: Call To Action
key_elements.description: What is the purpose of the site? Sign up for a consultation? Purchase a product?

websites.approach: Listening to clients, understanding target audience, and putting extensive online knowledge to work on a plan that improves business goals.

design_services.title: Design Services
design_services.description: From print to digital, we design the materials that bring your brand to life and move it forward.

items: PowerPoint templates built for real-world use
Custom slide masters with clean, consistent layouts
Pitches, proposals, internal decks, and reports
Annual reports, handbooks, sales packets, brochures
Corporate identity kits: business cards, letterhead, envelopes
Trade show booths, backdrops, pull up banners, table skirts
Billboards, large format posters, and banners
Display ads in all standard sizes
Designed to spec with bold CTAs and clear messaging
Email graphics, headers, and digital one-pagers
Designed to keep campaigns cohesive across platforms
Leave-behinds, fact sheets, and sales one-pagers
Support pieces tailored to your brand and audience

marketing_strategy.title: Marketing Strategy
marketing_strategy.description: From planning and campaign ideation to audience analysis, our marketing services cover it all.
marketing_strategy.tagline: From One-on-One Planning to Full-Scale Campaigns
marketing_strategy.philosophy: Smart strategy starts with knowing where you're headed.

offerings.name: One-on-One Strategy Sessions
offerings.description: Focused planning support to clarify your goals, outline your next steps, and make sure you're investing in the right efforts at the right time.

offerings.name: Messaging Concepts & Brand Positioning
offerings.description: Craft compelling messaging that resonates. From tone of voice to taglines, we help you articulate what makes you stand out.

offerings.name: Integrated Marketing Communications (IMC)
offerings.description: Build scalable, cross-platform plans that unify your message across digital, print, social, and more.

offerings.name: Target Market Analysis & Audience Insights
offerings.description: Define or refine your audience—so you're speaking to the right people, in the right way, across the right platforms.

offerings.name: Campaign Ideation & Creative Direction
offerings.description: Collaborative brainstorming and creative direction to turn your goals into action—whether it's a short-term push or a long-term plan.

offerings.name: Internal Communication Strategy & Tools
offerings.description: Strengthen alignment inside your organization by building effective systems, templates, and tools that keep your team connected and on message.

why_choose_us.name: Strategy First
why_choose_us.description: Everything we do starts with strategy and research—no guesswork.

why_choose_us.name: Flexible Fit
why_choose_us.description: From quick projects to full-scale builds, we flex to match your needs.

why_choose_us.name: Proven Process
why_choose_us.description: Every project follows a clear, repeatable path—from first draft to final delivery—keeping things on track and you in the loop.

why_choose_us.name: Organized to the Core
why_choose_us.description: Files never lost, versions always tracked—organization is our superpower.

why_choose_us.name: Designs That Work
why_choose_us.description: Every asset is built with intention: clear CTAs, audience targeting, and purpose-driven design that moves your business forward.

why_choose_us.name: Vibe Matters
why_choose_us.description: We're easy to work with, collaborative, and we pass the vibe check.

coast_to_coast_connections.name: Coast to Coast Connections
coast_to_coast_connections.description: A national network of trusted specialists developed by CommuniKATE to extend work beyond design and marketing.
coast_to_coast_connections.purpose: Help small businesses gain visibility, build relationships, and grow beyond their local markets—rooted in collaboration and community.
benefits: Access to a nationwide network of vetted business specialists
Educational workshops and curated networking events
A community-driven approach to sustainable growth

testimonials.author: James Robinson
testimonials.text: I had a great time working with Kate on revamping my business brand logo. She first took her time to do research on who I am, why & how I run my business the way I do, then gave practical constructive criticism and wise suggestions. After a series of comparative analysis of other logos in the same industry (both local and national), we went over what I like and don't like, what embodies me and sets me apart from the competition. Then after creating multiple logos for me, she took her time with me to add in and take away different aspects of the logo and color schemes. Finally we had the final product that I absolutely LOVE & proud to rock every day... and all my family, friends, current and past clients love the new look as well!!! Thanks again Katie - looking forward to working on other projects together in the future!

testimonials.author: Amy Hales
testimonials.text: Kate is a powerhouse—her strategic vision and hands-on approach elevated everything. Thanks to her expertise, our website now authentically reflects the spirit and story behind our product. She took the time to walk us through her strategic marketing plan, sharing insights from her thorough competitor analysis and delivering a tailored solution that aligned perfectly with our goals.

testimonials.author: Joel Klar
testimonials.text: CommuniKATE has been a fantastic asset to our business. While I initially hesitated to invest in a website with a professional look, the work she completed has been invaluable. She's exceptionally easy to collaborate with and has a remarkable ability to create impactful designs that help our business stand out.

testimonials.author: Kris Holmes
testimonials.text: CommuniKATE donated her time to help the non-profit that I was running at the time. She is creative, professional, detail oriented, and the complete package. I highly recommend her for any of your marketing/design needs!

testimonials.author: Samantha Alphonso
testimonials.text: Kate has proven to be an invaluable asset in the growth of my business. Her expertise in web design has resulted in an outstanding website for my company, enabling me to effectively market information to both potential and repeat customers. Kate's remarkable talent lies in her ability to transform ideas into tangible realities like no other!

testimonials.author: Ann Gillespie
testimonials.text: Kate always takes the time to understand the goal of the project before beginning the design work. She has high standards and a very organized approach to project management. Her designs elevate the message, her PPTs are sharp and her technical skill on deliverables always make my life easier! I fully trust her work and highly recommend her graphic design services.

testimonials.author: Ivy Anderson
testimonials.text: Kate is extremely talented and wonderful to work with!

faq_candidates.question: What services does CommuniKATE offer?
faq_candidates.answer: CommuniKATE offers four main service categories: Branding/Logo Design (brand refreshes and transformations), Website Design & Development (strategic, SEO-optimized websites), Design Services (print and digital design including presentations, collateral, and ads), and Marketing Strategy (from one-on-one consultations to full-scale campaign planning).

faq_candidates.question: Who is the founder of CommuniKATE?
faq_candidates.answer: Kate Reeve is the Founder, Strategist, and Creative Captain of CommuniKATE. She has a background in branding, design, and marketing strategy, and has worked with companies across industries from local nonprofits to national service brands.

faq_candidates.question: What is the B3 Method?
faq_candidates.answer: The B3 Method is CommuniKATE's framework for project success. It consists of three pillars: BE SEEN (eye-catching visuals & messaging), BE UNDERSTOOD (clear positioning and user-focused storytelling), and BE SUCCESSFUL (aligning every touchpoint with long-term goals).

faq_candidates.question: What types of clients does CommuniKATE work with?
faq_candidates.answer: CommuniKATE works with Corporate Teams, Entrepreneurs, Agencies, and Small & Mid Businesses across various industries, from local nonprofits to national service brands.

faq_candidates.question: Does CommuniKATE offer free consultations?
faq_candidates.answer: Yes, CommuniKATE offers free consultations. You can book one through their contact page at https://www.communikatetoday.com/contact

faq_candidates.question: What is Coast to Coast Connections?
faq_candidates.answer: Coast to Coast Connections is a national network of trusted specialists developed by CommuniKATE. It helps small businesses gain visibility, build relationships, and grow beyond their local markets through collaboration and community, offering access to vetted business specialists, networking events, and educational workshops.

faq_candidates.question: How can I contact CommuniKATE?
faq_candidates.answer: You can contact CommuniKATE by phone at 954.999.3814, through their contact form at https://www.communikatetoday.com/contact, or via their social media channels on Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

faq_candidates.question: What makes CommuniKATE different from other agencies?
faq_candidates.answer: CommuniKATE differentiates itself through: Strategy-first approach with no guesswork, flexibility from quick projects to full-scale builds, proven repeatable processes, exceptional organization, purpose-driven design with clear CTAs and audience targeting, and a collaborative, easy-to-work-with team culture.
